    index="stackoverflow",
    size="0",
    query={
        "query_string": {
            "query": "tags:kibana OR tags:javascript"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "low_quality_keywords": {
            "significant_terms": {
                "field": "tags",
                "size": 3,
                "exclude": [
                    "kibana",
                    "javascript"
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
